summary: An expedition searching for treasure supposedly buried by the German army in the African desert during WW II comes up against an army of Nazi zombies guarding the fortune.
cast: Manuel Gélin|Eduardo Fajardo|France Lomay|Jeff Montgomery|Lina Romay|Myriam Landson|Antonio Mayans|Javier Maiza|Eric Viellard|Caroline Audret|Albino Graziani|Miguel Ángel Aristu|Henri Lambert|Doris Regina|Jesús Franco|Daniel Katz|Juan Soler
keywords: bitten in the neck|video nasty|psychotronic film|nazisploitation|z movie
title: La tumba de los muertos vivientes
